name: v3-confidentiality
title: Confidentiality v3
description: The added values ​​(specific to our systems) which extend the CodeSystem provided by HL7

concept.definition: Privacy metadata indicating that the information has been de-identified, and there are mitigating circumstances that prevent re-identification
Privacy metadata indicating moderately sensitive information
Privacy metadata indicating that the information is typical
Privacy metadata indicating highly sensitive, potentially stigmatizing information
Privacy metadata indicating that the information is not classified as sensitive

Privacy metadata indicating that the information is extremely sensitive and likely stigmatizing health information that presents a very high risk if disclosed without authorization. This information must be kept in the highest confidence
